description:
The kids are given a homework assignment to walk around the neighborhood and make a map of the things they find. As they begin their exploration of the town, they come across all kinds of interesting places, like a fruit stand whose owner knows all the town gossip and even a mysterious haunted house. What kinds of maps will they come up with?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Make a Map of the Neighborhood?!
つくれ, ご近所マップ!?
